post.title: Pasadena
post.description: Pasadena is an independent city in Harris County southeast of Houston. It's located near the industrial Houston Ship Channel.

mainImage.alt: Krystal Mireles, 18, says she has an "instilled fear" of living near polluting industries and recurring chemical disasters. "It’s not matter of if, but when the next plant is going to explode." Courtesy photo.
mainImage.caption: Krystal Mireles, 18, says she has an "instilled fear" of living near polluting industries and recurring chemical disasters. "It’s not matter of if, but when the next plant is going to explode." Courtesy photo.

node.title: 'Pasadena is my home': A conversation about environmental justice with Krystal Mireles

children.text: Mireles, 18, is the first-place winner of this year's Environmental Youth Council video contest for her video about industrial disasters and the importance of clean air for all.

node.Action1Title: Watch this year's Youth Council videos
